1    | /**************************************************************************
2    | $Header: 4DOS.C Fri 11-10-2000 4:12:12 pm HvA V1.00 $
3    | ***************************************************************************/
4    | 
5    | #include <bios.h>
6    | 
7    | #ifndef FALSE
8    | #define FALSE 0
9    | #define TRUE !FALSE
10   | #endif
11   | 
12   | /*+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
13   |     FUNCTION: detect_4DOS()
14   |      PURPOSE: Detect if 4DOS is present
15   |  DESCRIPTION: Use INT 2Fh call
16   |      RETURNS: TRUE if 4dos detected, FALSE if not
17   |      HISTORY: 911214 V0.1 - Initial version
18   | ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++*/
19   | int detect_4DOS()
20   | {
21   |   union REGS regs;
22   | 
23   |   regs.x.ax = 0xD44D;
24   |   regs.x.bx = 0x0000;
25   |   int86(0x2F,&regs,&regs);
26   | 
27   |   if (regs.x.ax == 0xD44D)
28   |   {
29   |     /*-------------------
30   |       4DOS not present
31   |     --------------------*/
32   |     return(FALSE);
33   |   }
34   | 
35   |   if (regs.x.ax == 0x44DD)
36   |   {
37   |     /*-----------------
38   |       4DOS is present
39   |     ------------------*/
40   |     return(TRUE);
41   |   }
42   |   return(FALSE);
43   | }
44   | 
45   |
